00001 /* TraceToSMEquat, Copyright (c) 1999 Michael G. Henderson <mghenderson@lanl.gov>
00002  *
00003  *    - Traces down to the SM (solar magnetic) equatorial plane.
00004  *     
00005  *
00006  *
00007  * Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute, and sell this software and its
00008  * documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee, provided that
00009  * the above copyright notice appear in all copies and that both that
00010  * copyright notice and this permission notice appear in supporting
00011  * documentation.  No representations are made about the suitability of this
00012  * software for any purpose.  It is provided "as is" without express or
00013  * implied warranty.
00014  *
00015  */
00016 
00017 #include <stdio.h>
00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include "Lgm/Lgm_MagModelInfo.h"
00020 
00021 
00022 
00023 int Lgm_TraceToSMEquat( Lgm_Vector *u, Lgm_Vector *v, double tol, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00024 
00025     Lgm_Vector  u_scale;
00026     double      Htry, Hdid, Hnext, Hmin, Hmax, s, sgn, r2;
00027     double      Sa=0.0, Sb=0.0, Sc=0.0, d1, d2;
00028     double      Za, Zb, Zc, Z;
00029     Lgm_Vector  Ztmp;
00030     Lgm_Vector  Pa, Pb, Pc, P;
00031     int         done, reset;
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035     Hmax = 20.0;
00036     Hmin = 0.001;
00037     u_scale.x =  100.0;  u_scale.y = 100.0; u_scale.z = 100.0;
00038     Za = Zb = Zc = 0.0;
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042     /*
00043      *  Bracket the minimum. We want to find two points along
00044      *  the field line such that the location of equatorial plane is
00045      *  gauranteed to lie between them. To do this, we need to find
00046      *  three points; Pa, Pb, and Pc such that;
00047      *
00048      *           Pc > Pb > Pa
00049      *
00050      *      and  |z_sm( Pa )|   >   |z_sm( Pb )|
00051      *      and  |z_sm( Pc )|   >   |z_sm( Pb )|
00052      *
00053      *
00054      */
00055 
00056 
00057     /* 
00058      *  Set the start point, Pa and Za (the absolute value of the SM z coord).
00059      */
00060     Pa   = *u;
00061     Lgm_Convert_Coords( &Pa, &Ztmp, GSM_TO_SM, Info->c );
00062     Za   = fabs( Ztmp.z );
00063     Sa   = 0.0;
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067 
00068     /*
00069      *  If we are above the SM plane (i.e. in the northern hemisphere), lets 
00070      *  try tracing against the field direction.
00071      */
00072     sgn = ( Ztmp.z > 0.0 ) ? -1.0 : 1.0;
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076     /*
00077      *  Keep stepping along the field line until we have a |Zsm| less than the start point.
00078      */
00079     P    = Pa;
00080     done = FALSE;
00081     Htry = Za;
00082     while ( !done ) {
00083 
00084         Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00085         Lgm_Convert_Coords( &P, &Ztmp, GSM_TO_SM, Info->c );
00086         Z = fabs( Ztmp.z );
00087             if (   (P.x > Info->OpenLimit_xMax) || (P.x < Info->OpenLimit_xMin) || (P.y > Info->OpenLimit_yMax) || (P.y < Info->OpenLimit_yMin)
00088                 || (P.z > Info->OpenLimit_zMax) || (P.z < Info->OpenLimit_zMin) ) {
00089             /*
00090              *  Open FL!
00091              */
00092             v->x = v->y = v->z = 0.0;
00093             return(0);
00094         } else if ( Z < Za ) {
00095             done = TRUE;
00096             Pb = P;
00097             Zb = Z;
00098             Sb += Hdid;
00099         } else {
00100             Pa = P;
00101             Za = Z;
00102             Sa = 0.0;
00103         }
00104 
00105         Htry = Z;
00106 
00107     }
00108 
00109 
00110 
00111     /*
00112      *  Keep stepping along the field line until we complete the bracket triple.
00113      */
00114     done = FALSE;
00115     while (!done) {
00116 
00117         P = Pb;
00118         Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00119         Lgm_Convert_Coords( &P, &Ztmp, GSM_TO_SM, Info->c );
00120         Z = fabs( Ztmp.z );
00121             if (   (P.x > Info->OpenLimit_xMax) || (P.x < Info->OpenLimit_xMin) || (P.y > Info->OpenLimit_yMax) || (P.y < Info->OpenLimit_yMin)
00122                 || (P.z > Info->OpenLimit_zMax) || (P.z < Info->OpenLimit_zMin) ) {
00123             /*
00124              *  Open FL!
00125              */
00126             v->x = v->y = v->z = 0.0;
00127             return(0);
00128         } else if ( Z < Zb ) {
00129             Pa = Pb; Za = Zb; Sa = 0.0;
00130             Pb = P;  Zb = Z;  Sb = Hdid; 
00131             r2  = P.x*P.x + P.y*P.y + P.z*P.z;
00132             Htry = (Hnext < Hmax) ? ((Hnext > Hmin) ? Hnext : Hmin) : Hmax;
00133             if (Htry*Htry > r2) Htry = 0.25*sqrt(r2);
00134         } else {
00135             Pc = P;  Zc = Z; Sc = Sb + Hdid;
00136             done = TRUE;
00137         }
00138 
00139 
00140     }
00141     
00142 
00143 
00144 
00145 
00146 
00147 
00148     /*
00149      *  We have a bracket. Now go in for the kill.
00150      *  Use golden-section search to converge toward minimum.
00151      *  (Sa, Sb, Sc) are the distances of the triple points along
00152      *  the FL. For convenience, we maintain Sa = 0.0, so that
00153      *  Sb and Sc are always the distances relative to Pa. (And
00154      *  so Sc is always the width of the bracketed interval. So when
00155      *  Sc gets small enough we bail out and take Pb as the min).
00156      */
00157     done = FALSE;
00158     while (!done) {
00159 
00160         d1 = Sb;
00161         d2 = Sc - Sb;
00162         if ( Sc < tol ) {
00163             done = TRUE;
00164         } else if ( d1 > d2 ) {
00165 
00166             P = Pa; Htry = 0.381966011*d1;
00167             Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00168             Lgm_Convert_Coords( &P, &Ztmp, GSM_TO_SM, Info->c );
00169             Z = fabs( Ztmp.z );
00170             if ( Z < Zb ) {
00171                 Pb = P; Zb = Z; Sb = Hdid;
00172             } else {
00173                 Pa = P; Za = Z; Sb -= Hdid; Sc -= Hdid;
00174             }
00175         
00176         } else {
00177 
00178             P = Pb; Htry = 0.381966011*d2;
00179             Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00180             Lgm_Convert_Coords( &P, &Ztmp, GSM_TO_SM, Info->c );
00181             Z = fabs( Ztmp.z );
00182             if ( Z < Zb ) {
00183                 Pb = P; Zb = Z; Sb += Hdid;
00184             } else {
00185                 Pc = P; Zc = Z; Sc = Sb + Hdid;
00186             }
00187 
00188         }
00189 
00190     }
00191 
00192 
00193     /*
00194      *  Take location of the Min-B surface to be Pb.
00195      */
00196     *v = Pb;
00197 
00198 
00199     return( 1 );
00200 
00201 }
00202

00204  *   $id$
00205  */
